original_text: The Holy God says, ‘You cannot find anyone who is like me. Nobody is the same as me.’ The Holy God says, ‘You cannot find anyone who is like me. Nobody is the same as me.’ The Holy God says, ‘You cannot find anyone who is like me. Nobody is the same as me.’ The Holy God says, ‘You cannot find anyone who is like me. Nobody is the same as me.’ The Holy God says,
korean_text: 거룩하신 이가 이르시되 그런즉 너희가 나를 누구에게 비교하여 나를 그와 동등하게 하겠느냐 하시니라

sentences.original_text: You cannot find anyone who is like me.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 나와 같은 이를 찾을 수 없다.

sentences.original_text: Nobody is the same as me.
